pkgmetadata.longdescription: # schulze-condorcet[![PyPI version shields.io](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/schulze-condorcet)](https://pypi.org/project/schulze-condorcet/)[![Build Status](https://github.com/cde-ev/schulze-condorcet/actions/workflows/tests.yml/badge.svg?branch=master)](https://github.com/cde-ev/schulze-condorcet/actions/workflows/tests.yml)Python package to evaluate ballots using the Schulze Condorcet method.
